description.en:
Eugene continues his life as a high school student while performing his unexpectedly simple duties, but one day he is bullied because he helped a friend who was bullied. As ordinary life begins to crack, the trials that are increasingly difficult to take will come, and the earth is in the worst crisis. Can Eugene solve all these events and save the planet?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/shonen/monster/list?title_no=3129)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/monster/list?title_no=1698)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/monster/list?title_no=2909)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001523)
description.id:
Agen rahasia ini memiliki kekuatan super, tapi kehidupan sehari-harinya malah di-bully?! Yoo Jin seorang siswa yang memiliki pekerjaan sampingan sebagai agen rahasia dengan kekuatan super. Semuanya berjalan baik-baik saja sampai suatu hari dirinya terlibat dalam bullying yang terjadi di sekolahnya. Kini hidupnya semakin sulit karena dia harus menghadapi Cha Donghae si bully, bersamaan dengan 'devil' yang terus membuat masalah di sekitarnya. Mampukah Yoo Jin menyelesaikan masalah-masalah ini dan menyelamatkan dunia?!

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/shonen/monster/list?title_no=3129)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/monster/list?title_no=1698)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/monster/list?title_no=2909)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001523)
description.ja:
#正義の守護者 #エージェントD #ミッションはデビル制圧

---

description.ko:
특수기관 '몬스터'에서 아르바이트를 하며 생계를 이어나가고 있는 고등학생 유진. 
#초능력 보유 #코드네임은 요원D #미션은 데빌 신속제압
유진은 의외로(?) 간단한 자신의 임무를 수행하면서 무난하게 고등학생의 생활을 이어가지만,
어느 날 왕따를 당하는 친구를 도와줬다는 이유로 본인도 같이 왕따를 당하게 된다.
평범한 생활에 균열이 생기기 시작하면서 점점 감당하기 힘든 시련이 찾아오게 되고 
급기야 지구는 최악의 위기에 처하게 되는데..
과연 유진은 이 모든 사건을 해결하고 지구를 구할 수 있을까?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/shonen/monster/list?title_no=3129)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/monster/list?title_no=1698)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/monster/list?title_no=2909)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001523)
description.zh:
地球出现危机！
懦弱少年真实身份竟是？！
在特殊机构“MONSTER”做兼职维持生计的男主柳振。他拥有超能力，代号特工D ，负责替“MONSTER”快速制服恶魔。柳振一边完成还算轻松的任务，一边过着平凡的校园生活。但是某一天，因为出手帮助了被孤立的同学，他也开始在学校被孤立。原本平静的生活被打破，他开始面临越来越多的考验。这时，地球陷入了最严重的危机，柳振能解决所有的困难，拯救地球吗？

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/shonen/monster/list?title_no=3129)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/monster/list?title_no=1698)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/monster/list?title_no=2909)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001523)
description.zh-hk:
靠著在特殊組織「MONSTER」打工來維持生計的高中生柳真。 #擁有超能力 #編碼是要員D #主要任務是制壓惡魔 柳真意外(?)地在執行簡單的任務中, 順利的度過著高中生活。但是某一天因為幫助了一位被排擠的朋友, 自己也一起被排擠了。 隨著平凡的生活出現了變化, 逐漸面臨難以承受的考驗, 地球最終陷入了最險惡的危機之中… 柳真究竟能解決這一切, 拯救地球嗎?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/shonen/monster/list?title_no=3129)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/monster/list?title_no=1698)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/monster/list?title_no=2909)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001523)
